text.en: As, out of the wish to benefit others,
text.en-trans: gang tsé dak gi zhenpen sem kyi su

text.en: I visualize you upon the fresh lotus in my heart,
text.en-trans: nying ü pema zhönnur khyö dren né

text.en: May the melodious sound of your nectar-like speech,
text.en-trans: lek shé dütsi drayang tro gyi na

text.en: O Mañjuśrī, confer its splendour upon my mind!
text.en-trans: jampal dak gi yi la pal tsol chik
